description: Try our easy to follow No-Bake Dark Chocolate & Date Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: No-Bake Dark Chocolate & Date Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour chocolate mixture over date layer, spreading evenly with a palette knife or back of a spoon. Scatter over salt flakes and freeze for 3 hours or until firm. Use a hot knife to cut slice into 20 pieces, then store in the freezer until ready to serve.
